title: The Mom's Guide to Growing Your Family Green: Saving the Earth Begins at Home
description: With the multitude of green choices available, how can moms determine what will be best for their families—and the environment? Terra Wellington has the answers. This user-friendly and invaluable resource is packed with hundreds of easy green how-tos • Get the most bang for your buck by purchasing organic foods that would otherwise have high pesticide residue, like apples, grapes, green peppers, peaches, and pears. • Save money and water by scraping—not rinsing— dishes before putting them in the dishwasher. Today’s models are so efficient that rinsing is not necessary. • Home Screensavers don’t save energy. Instead have the computer switch to sleep mode when idle.
author: Terra Wellington
